Name: Lemon Drop Martini
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Sherbety lemon - well-balanced and refreshing, but not really a Martini.
History: An Alternatini (served in a V-shaped glass but not a Martini) that was popular during the 1990s.
Nutrition: One serving of Lemon Drop Martini contains 201 calories
